title: What to Watch: Six Shows and Movies to Stream
sub_head: From Will Ferrell and Paul Rudd’s new series ‘The Shrink Next Door’ to Dianne Wiest as a prison teacher in ‘Mayor of Kingstown,’ here are new films and series to stream this week
body: Will Ferrell and Paul Rudd explain why they knew who was going to be the doctor and who was going to be the mark in “The Shrink Next Door.” Academy Award winner Dianne Wiest tells us that she’s done playing domesticated mom stuff—but being a mom in Jeremy Renner’s “Mayor of Kingstown” is different. Plus, repercussions from the fall of a Seattle megachurch reverberate through the evangelical communities in “The Rise and Fall of Mars Hill.” Here’s where to stream them all:
